name: STARFACE Mobile Client
description: The STARFACE UCC Communications Hub for your Android smartphone.  The STARFACE UCC Client combines powerful high-end business telephony with a seamless integration of instant messaging, voicemail, video chat, and faxing. These UCC features are now available in a mobile client for your Android smartphone. STARFACE Mobile Client for Android bundles all of your communication channels on your iPhone and turns it into an innovative and modern UCC communications center for your STARFACE telephone system.  The Journal keeps you up to date with everything that happens. Who sent you a chat message? Who called you and left a message on your voicemail? You can see everything concerning your STARFACE account. Your STARFACE Function Keys (BLFs) are also available right on your mobile phone, as are instant messaging and the STARFACE address book. The integrated call manager gives you access to a wide selection of functionality and ease-of-use features such as call brokering (toggling), call forwarding and inquiry hold.  The STARFACE Mobile Client for Android works over LTE and Wi-Fi and directly reduces your mobile phone bill. The STARFACE Mobile Client for Android is available to download free of charge.  Features  Calling  SIP calls  GSM calls  Call-Back by STARFACE PBX  Call-Through with module installed on STARFACE  Hold / Toggle  Blind Transfer / Attended Transfer  Ad-hoc conference calls  Contacts  Function Keys and Busy Lamp Fields  Access to local contacts  Access to address book hosted on STARFACE PBX  Instant messaging  Chat with users on STARFACE PBX  Group chat with users on STARFACE PBX  Definition of Chat status und status text  Journal  Displays all missed events  Separate lists for calls, voicemails, faxes, and chat messages  Status  Enable/disable iFMC  Enable/disable redirections  Enable/disable DND   Einstellungen  Encryption  Standard call method  Enable/disable phone features  Enable/disable chat features  Your forum for feature requests and ideas: https://starface.uservoice.com  System Requirements  Android 5.0 or higher  A STARFACE PBX (Version 6.3 or higher)  For full functionality incl. SIP telephony, a STARFACE UCC Premium Licence on the STARFACE PBX is required for the particular user.  www.starface.de
